Detailed Description

This struct defines the paramters for the attenuation correction
Parameters:
enable if attenuation correction enabled
threshold value to define presence of attenuating material
muImageFilename full path and name of mu image
muScale this factor is determined by unit of mu, if the unit is 1/mm, the value is 1. if the unit is 1/cm the value is 0.1 etc.
mu_FWHM atteunation smoothing FWHM in mm
verbosity level of output
